example.description: Tries to sets the font for all nodes in a tree to "Arial". If "Arial" is not available on the target system, the default sans serif font will be selected. (Note that concrete font names are string values and must be in quotation marks, while sans-serif is a constant identifier and must not be in quotation marks. Unless a fault-tolerance implementation is available, applications would consider "sans-serif" as a concrete font name which would not be found and will not select the default sans serif font.)
